list.q: What is included in the IELTS practice test?
list.a: It includes section-based drills for Reading, Listening, Writing, and Speaking.

list.q: How is the mock test scored?
list.a: Our system simulates official scoring rubrics for each section.

list.q: Is the study plan suitable for beginners?
How does AI help with my IELTS preparation?
list.a: AI generates personalized mock tests, scores them, and provides feedback based on your performance.
